email_1.subject: Don't Let Missed Calls Steal Your Revenue
email_1.body: Hi there! ✨ As a Home Services professional, you know the importance of timely communication. But did you know that missed calls can lead to lost revenue? That's where Noah, our AI Agent, comes in. With Noah, you'll never miss another call again. Interested in seeing how it works? Check out this 30-second demo: [link] ✨

email_2.subject: From Missed Calls to Increased Revenue
email_2.body: Hey there! ✨ As we discussed earlier, missed calls can be a major revenue drain for your business. But what if you could turn those missed opportunities into increased revenue? With Noah's AI-powered solution, that's exactly what you can do. Watch this 30-second demo to see how: [link] ✨

email_3.subject: The Last Chance to Boost Your Revenue
email_3.body: Hi again! ✨ This is your final chance to discover the power of Noah, our AI Agent that turns missed calls into revenue-generating opportunities. Don't let another call slip away - check out this 30-second demo and start growing your business today: [link] ✨
